title: Task 23

question.text: What is the cause of the issue Tom is talking about?

answers.answer: He thinks it's a network connectivity issue.
answers.feedback: Network connectivity issues are about connections between computers or systems. Tom is talking about data processing, not connectivity.

answers.answer: The problem is with the user interface.
answers.feedback: User interface (UI) is how people interact with software. Tom's issue is about data processing, not UI.

answers.answer: It's an issue with the code's security features.
answers.feedback: Security features protect software from attacks. Tom suggests the problem is with data processing, not security.

dialogue.text: Well, I believe it may be related to data processing.

description: Listen to the audio and answer the question.
